title: Charming 1920s Studio Near BART & Downtown
posting_body: ['OPEN HOUSE', 'Sunday, July 31,  9 - 10am', 'Call or text Dorrit, the on-site manager at', 'show contact info', 'if you have any questions.', 'Please do not email.', 'THIS COULD BE YOUR NEW HOME!', 'California Apartments is a restored 90-year-old building with many long-term residents.', 'The apartments in this vintage building have hardwood floors, tall ceilings, gas stoves, and great bathtubs.', 'There is shared on-site laundry and a garden patio.', 'The unit is available now.', 'Are you our next neighbor?', 'APARTMENT DESCRIPTION', '• 1920s stucco building', '• Hardwood floors', '• Gas oven and gas heat', '• 9-foot ceilings', '• Full bathroom', '• New, double-paned windows', '• No pets', '• One-year lease minimum', 'UTILITIES', '• Owner pays water, hot water, garbage', '• Tenant pays gas, electric, internet', '• High-speed fiber internet ready', 'LOCATION, LOCATION, LOCATION', '• Walk score of 92, and biking score of 99!', '• 2 blocks to Ohlone Park', '• 4 blocks to the North Berkeley BART Station', '• 5 blocks to Trader Joe’s', '• 6 blocks to downtown Berkeley and the Berkeley BART', '• Walking distance to movie theaters, music venues, and restaurants', '• On a major bus line (the 51)', '• Easy access to 4th Street, the freeway, Gourmet Ghetto, and much, much more!', 'BUILDING AMENITIES', '• Responsive, friendly on-site management', '• Controlled-access entry and intercom system', '• Laundry room on premises', '• Secure bicycle parking (free!)', '• Garden patio', 'APPLICATION PROCESS', '• Completed and signed application form', '• Proof of income equaling 2 times the monthly rent (check stubs)', '• Copy of recent bank statement', '• Non-refundable fee of $35 for a credit check', 'MOVE-IN COSTS', "• First month's rent", '• Deposit equal to one month rent', 'Managed by Barcelon Associates Mgmt', '. Corp. BRE#00754145']
